```{r}
# make this example reproducible
n <- 12

# generating data
a <- function(k) {
  res <- (k * log(k * k * n + pi))
  return(res - floor(res))
}

X <- seq(1, 100)
for (idx in 1:100) {
  X[idx] = a(idx)
}

Y <- seq(1, 50)
for (idx in 1:50) {
  Y[idx] = a(idx)
}

X
Y
```
